text: Choosing the right template of a theme for system pages when you have a child theme (and it doesn't customize the template, so it fully inherits from the parent) means that the system template picker shows the same template twice (one with the child settings + global groups, and the other as the parent  theme env.). Can you give us a visual hint about which is the child template or root so we don't have to blind test :slightly_smiling_face:
If you use the search bar and type the unique portion of the child theme's name, it will pull it up quickly

topic: We do not actively track Ideas posted here. Please make sure to post ideas in the *official* tracker: <https://ideas.HubSpot.com> to ensure it's captured. For any support questions, go to <https://help.HubSpot.com/>
